title: COMPLETE AND TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT
body:
patch 7.10

The most pathetic useless excuse for client updates. RIOT ONCE AGAIN IGNORES COUNTLESS ISSUES WITH THE CLIENT.

Where's the item sets?
Where's the profile stats?
Where's the fwotd change?
Why is everything still laggy and slow?

Unreliable lazy company. shame on the dev team and shame on whoever made this client, I honestly hope none of you take pride in this ugly half ass waste of resources "Client"

gtfo with this garbage

replies.body: How about you try to do all the work they do before you start bashing them because you aren't happy they don't meet your unrealistic standards. They can't just make everything we ask for in a matter of days, it takes time to do this stuff, and some features take priority over others. If they can do something quickly then they will, but otherwise they need to follow any schedules or guidelines they have made for themselves to make sure everything goes smoothly and efficiently.

> [{quoted}](name=Kryonik,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=2mMpu1tW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-16T21:42:15.580+0000)
>
> How about you try to do all the work they do before you start bashing them because you aren't happy they don't meet your unrealistic standards. They can't just make everything we ask for in a matter of days, it takes time to do this stuff, and some features take priority over others. If they can do something quickly then they will, but otherwise they need to follow any schedules or guidelines they have made for themselves to make sure everything goes smoothly and efficiently.

Well considering these features existed before the new client was made.
They have an entire staff of trained / educated employees.
They've had 3+ weeks and many many months before the forced change.
The features that need fixed could all be done relatively quickly as they are not gigantic core game updates.

What about my request is "unrealistic standards"

Asking for the first win of the day timer to include seconds and minutes? something the old client did normally, that's a totally unrealistic request??

Letting us disable dynamic backgrounds on our profile is unrealistic?

Showing the number of games we won on the profile is unrealistic? 

Fuck off sucking Riot's dick. I have only a small time in game development and I could fix like 10 of these issues in a DAY by myself.
If the new client was so much better, then the tools to implement these changes should be even better!
It shouldn't take 1,000 veteran game devs over 6 months to do shit that an amateur can do in one evening.
Literally paying people money to work on this for weeks at a time and they crap a big turd right in a million players faces
